about.title: Love for
about.description1: Sushi making is not just an art form, it's live theater. In a display of ancient techniques, our chefs prepare each dish in front of you with precision and passion.
about.description2: Our experienced sushi chefs select everything, so only the very best ends up on your plate. An intimate sushi experience, blending modern and ancient techniques, where every detail is considered, Tokai Sushi is the place for voyeuristic chef watching. Welcome to Tokai Sushi
